methods.void addRequestProperty(String key, Stri: Adds a general request property specified by a key-value pair.
methods.void connect(): Opens a communications link to the resource referenced by this URL, if such a connection has not already been established.

methods.Object getContent(): Retrieves the contents of this URL connection.

methods.Map getHeaderFields(): Returns an unmodifiable Map of the header fields.
methods.long getIfModifiedSince(): Returns the value of this object's ifModifiedSince field.

methods.OutputStream getOutputStream(): Returns an output stream that writes to this connection.

methods.String guessContentTypeFromStream(InputS: Tries to determine the type of an input stream based on the characters at the beginning of the input stream.
methods.void setAllowUserInteraction(boolean all: Set the value of the allowUserInteraction field of this URLConnection.

methods.void setDefaultAllowUserInteraction(bool: Sets the default value of the allowUserInteraction field for all future URLConnection objects to the specified value.
